title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8127.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8127.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Riverside Drive
between Route 30A and a point 0.2 mile east of Thruway exit 28 in the Village
of Fultonville and Town of Glen. (b) Route 30A. Route 30A between Riverside

Drive and Route 5 in the Villages of Fonda and Fultonville. (c) Route 30A between Route 5 - West Main

Street and the Fulton-Montgomery county line in the Village of Fonda and the

Town of Mohawk. (d) Route 10
between Erie Boulevard and Route 5 in the Villages of Canajoharie and Palatine

Bridge. (e) Route 5. Route 5
between the Herkimer-Montgomery county line and the Schenectady-Montgomery
county line in the City of Amsterdam and the Villages of St. Johnsville, Nelliston, Palatine Bridge, Fonda, and Fort Johnson and the Towns of St. Johnsville, Palatine, Mohawk and Amsterdam. (f) Route 5 between Stoner's Trail Road, CR
28, and Route 30 in the City of Amsterdam, Village of Fort Johnson, and the

Towns of Mohawk and Amsterdam. (g) Sacandaga Road, CR 23, between Stoner's Trail Road, CR 28, and Route 67 in the

Towns of Mohawk and Amsterdam. (h) Route 67 between Sacandaga Road, CR 23, and the Fulton-Montgomery county line
in the Towns of Mohawk and Amsterdam. (i) Route 30 between IR 90, exit 27, and the

Fulton-Montgomery county line in the City of Amsterdam and the Town of

Amsterdam. (j) Route 67. Route 67
(Church Street) between Route 30 and the Montgomery/Saratoga county line, in
the City of Amsterdam and the Town of Amsterdam. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8127.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
